a.n: Coleman Hawkins live at the Adolphe Sax

p.k: Coleman Hawkins live at the Adolphe Sax Festival 1962. Coleman Hawkins. Adolphe Sax Festival, Belgium
p.d: Coleman Hawkins: Live in '62 presents two incredible concerts from 1962 and 1964 featuring 140 minutes of music. Both concerts feature stellar European and American side-musicians including Harry 'Sweets' Edison on trumpet and drummer 'Papa' Jo Jones â€“ both jazz legends in their own right. Coleman Hawkins, 'The Father of Jazz Saxophone,' demonstrates in these two concerts why he is still considered one of the most important innovators in the history of jazz.
